Text:
This game is unplayable without the patches - which cannot be appied on this version.

We need an ISO! :)

I can confirm it's 1.08 and that works

Thanks uploader!!

May i ask how to update it when new patches come out?
Just put the directory in steamapps and run latest steamemu will do ? [3.64 no longer working for me]

Any suggestion would be appreciated.. in any case thanks!!
Oh well if it's 1.08 then thanks!
Is this going to get my steam account banned?

Like the seeder says, unrar and play. You do not need Steam started to play this. I don't know if you need Steam installed or not, but I doubt you would.

This is indeed version 1.08 and it works perfectly without any hassle here.
It says that MSVCP71.dll file is not there. What to do?

I found the solution, at least it worked with 1.20 version. What you need to do is:
-download 1.79 patch
-download "Universal Extractor"
-extract the patch to some random folder
-copy all the files from {app} folder in the extract dir
-paste all the files to the main SE:V folder
-have fun :)
Which, in turn, resets the security to asking for a CD key.  -.-

Luckily it didn't take long to find one...

GL19 Y15U 72FO U5SW

I found the 1.79 patch, but it's simply a .exe to make the update, and if i try to run it, I get a message saying that the update  needs an older version of SE5 to be able to make the patch. Is there anywhere I can find the files to update manually?

@NephilimNexus
thanks a lot for posting the key got 1.79 working no problem

@tnvidigal

u need the "Universal Extractor" program mentioned by asnodeus; just search for it in google or go to 
http://legroom.net/software/uniextract
which is the site you find on google anyway.

-download universal extractor and install

-then when u open Universal Extractor in the top box do browse and find the 1.79 patch exe where ever it is on ur pc 

-after that make a new folder on ur desktop 

-now in the bottom box browse and find the folder u made and then hit extract (the extract to any folder part mentioned by asnodeus)

-once finished open the folder and then open {APP}s folder and copy all the stuff inside to your SE5 directory

-replace all

- use the key NephilimNexus so kindly provided
